translation: All the sons of Dhritarashtra, along with the hosts of kings of the earth, Bhishma, Drona, and Karna, as well as the chief among our warriors.
commentary: 11.26 Ami these? f and? You Thee? Dhritarashtra's of Dhritarashtra? Sons sons? All all? with with? Eve even? Avanipalasanghaih hosts of kings? Bhishma: Bhishma? Drona: Drona? Sutaputra: Karana? And also? Asau this? with with? by ours with (those) of ours? Even also? warrior chiefs (with) warrior chiefs.Commentary Karna? though he was the son of Kunti? the mother of the Pandavas? was brought up by a charioteer and hence came to be regarded as his son.
